pkgmetadata.longdescription: # lambdaSdk> easy invoking lambda functionswritten on top of boto3, for the shortest way to invoke aws lambda functions## Install`pip install lambdasdk` ## How to use## prepare### Create user and set up credsIf not on aws, you need to create iam account and map the following keys#### user and pw##### if not on aws```user = aws_access_key_idpw = aws_secret_access_key```##### if run on aws```user = Nonepw = NonesessionToken = None``````from lambdasdk.lambdasdk import Lambda``````lambda_ = Lambda( user = None, pw = None, sessionToken = None, region = 'ap-southeast-1')``````lambda_.invoke( functionName= 'lambda-pip' , input = {'test':'test'}, invocationType= 'RequestResponse' )``` {'statusCode': 200, 'body': '"Hello from Lambda!"'}
